sections.title: Social Media Checklist
items: When new content has been produced; make sure to publish and share the link to social media platforms
Publish video to YouTube channel: Software Engineering at Home
Post content link on Patreon: SoftwareEngineeringAtHome

sections.title: Publish video to YouTube channel
items: Post standard call to actions to follow on Twitter and Patreon

sections.title: Post content link to Twitter
items: Make post on Twitter linking to video

sections.title: Post content link on Patreon
items: Make post on Patreon linking to video
